Class Posting

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.bmi.search.indexing.Posting

  • public class Posting
extends java.lang.Object
    Posting basic structure used by an index.

      Returns the amount of times the term appears in the document.

      Returns a list containing the term position within the associated document.
      static java.util.List<Posting> listFromBytes(java.lang.String term, byte[] array)
      Receives a byte array with consecutive packages formated as the output of positionToBytes and builds a List of Postings from it.
      byte[] positionsToBytes()
      Returns an array of bytes with postings information as follows:
      #docID,#positions,position1,position2,...,positionN
      int positionsToBytesSize()
      Returns the size of the array returned by positionsToBytes

      • listFromBytes

        public static java.util.List<Posting> listFromBytes(java.lang.String term,
                                                    byte[] array)
        Receives a byte array with consecutive packages formated as the output of positionToBytes and builds a List of Postings from it.
        Parameters:
        term - term String, every posting in the list will be associated to this term.
        array - array containing postings.
        Returns:
        a List of Postings recovered from array.
